A/V++ thanks extrm  !!!Does any1 use a cuicker converter then converXto DVD 5?

Audio:7
Video:8 (small) - 6 rating when full screened.
Video gets fuzzy and blurred during full screen viewing and extremely 'ripped' when hard action scenes happen. Audio has a slight jiss to it in background and is not normalized throughout,so it'll go loud then too quiet through whole movie. Pretty annoying.
Final thought: Pretty disappointed. usually, extremezone has quality dl's when i've downed them in the past - and some recent- this doesn't seem to be of your best efforts- and I'm thinking it's not your work at all,but maybe someone you trusted to do quality and they let you down on this. Thanks though for the upload effort, i look forward to more from you in the near future.
